questions.name: currentChallenges
questions.label: What are your current business challenges?
questions.value: We struggle with manual data entry and customer support response times. Our team spends 20+ hours per week on repetitive tasks.

questions.name: goals
questions.label: What are your business goals for the next 12 months?
questions.value: Increase operational efficiency by 30%, reduce customer support costs, and improve customer satisfaction scores.
